Question
========
The gravitational force exerted by a large body, such as the Earth,
is called

Answerlist
----------
* weight
* gravitational field strength
* gravitational mass
* inertial mass

Solution
========
The gravitational force exerted by a large body, such as the Earth, is called
**weight**. (p. 94)
